title: Update package for Microsoft Office 2007 SP3 - November 2015
description:
************************************************************
Update package for Microsoft Office 2007 SP3 - November 2015
************************************************************

The Update Package allows a silent install of Microsoft Office 2007 updates without the need for an internet connexion.

Features

- Silent update of an installed Office suite
- Extraction of MSP files to update an installation folder for later integration with an installation distribution

The package include all updates released by November 10, 2015 and applies to any version of Office 2007 Suite (language neutral).

Update list for Microsoft Office 2007 (november 2015)

Update for Microsoft Office Outlook 2007 Junk Email Filter (KB3101557)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Excel 2007 (KB3101554)
Security Update for Microsoft Office InfoPath 2007 (KB2687406)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Word 2007 (KB3085552)
Security Update for Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2007 (KB3085548)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Publisher 2007 (KB2880506)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack Service Pack 3 (KB3085551)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Access 2007 (KB2596614)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2007 suites (KB3085620)
Security Update for Microsoft Office OneNote 2007 (KB2889915)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack Service Pack 3 (KB3101558)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2007 suites (KB3101555)

====
Usage
====

- In both cases make sure that your installed version (or installation media) of Office Suite is already updated to October 2015 level
- If you are unsure, you can grab the October 2015 version here: Office ProPlus 2007 SP3 VL x86 en-US October 2015 
https://kat.cr/microsoft-office-professional-plus-2007-sp3-vl-x86-en-us-october-2015-t11491125.html

1. Silent update of installed Office suit
-------------------------------------------

- Download the Update pack
- Unzip and run batch file 'xxx.xx Update Office Installed'

2. Extract MSP files to update an installation folder
---------------------------------------------------- 

- Unzip and run batch file 'xxx.xx Extract MSP files' (as admin on Vista or greater)
- The batch file creates a subfolder 'Extracted' within the same folder, and extracts all MSP update files in it
- Update your installation manually (copy all MSP files to the updates folder)

Batch file reference: https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc178995.aspx#DeployExeWithScript
